item.title: Syncing YouTube and Spotify with Python
item.dc:creator: Jose Logreira
item.description: I started learning Python until recent months (pandemic-given time). I gotta say it’s been fun and very interesting, considering my background in C language. One of the best ways to understand technology (or so I’ve been told) is by projects-based learning. So this is my first take with Python and REST APIs.

item.title: A Nixie Tube Clock Design
item.dc:creator: Jose Logreira
item.description: Digital clocks are fun electronic projects. Add some 160V nixie tubes and you get an extra layer of vintage art.
